Name: Island Getaway
About the game: Island Getaway -Play at your own pace -Intuitive controls -Uses Arm Swing Locomotion to provide immersive movement without making the player sick -Various activities for the player to get lost in paradise: Bowling, Hoops, Archery, Rock Climbing, Tennis and more! -Sandbox style gameplay/exploration -New content weekly!
